name: Comment formatting
description: Style comments using Markdown formatting. Largely inspired by and based on ScratchTools' ScratchFormat setting.

info.text: Anyone with this addon enabled can view the text formatted. Everyone else will see plain text (no styling).
This addon is incompatible with other extensions that make changes to comment text (specifically the "Line breaks in comments" addon).
Scratch Emojis are not supported (yet). This is currently an experimental addon and there's missing features!
